Title: Britain's nursery problem: Parents still face 'childcare deserts'
Description: Nursery places can difficult to find, particularly in certain areas - so why have successive governments not yet found a solution?

Title: Gemini Live's real-time screen sharing is now available to all Android users
Description: The feature was initially limited to Advanced subscribers, allowing users to share their screens or camera feeds with Gemini to get real-time assistance.

Title: Why CEOs are taking it slow with big decisions
Description: CEOs are slowing things down with one simple word: "pause."

Title: The Cybertruck is coming to Saudi Arabia and Dubai. That's still a problem for Tesla.
Description: Tesla is now selling the Cybertruck outside North America for the first time, but not in its biggest markets due to the vehicle's design quirks and size.

Title: I was raised to be a tradwife. Now, I'm the CEO of a business that generates millions in revenue.
Description:
Makena Finger Zannini was raised in a conservative evangelical community.
By age 6 she knew she didn't want to follow her parents' footsteps.

Title: 'I turned into the devil': Moises Mendoza, a 'sadistic' killer, set for Texas execution
Description: Moises Mendoza is set to be executed by lethal injection on April 23 for the murder of Rachelle O'Neil Tolleson in Farmersville, Texas in 2004.

Title: Surfer fights for survival after vicious sea lion attack off coastline: 'Its eyes locked onto me with an unsettling ferocity'
Description: "I don't know how to describe the fear that gripped me in that moment."

Title: Subtitling Your Life
Description: Hearing aids and cochlear implants have been getting better for years, but a new type of device—eyeglasses that display real-time speech transcription on their lenses—are a game-changing breakthrough, David Owen writes.

Title: The Real Legacy of Pope Francis
Description: Early in his papacy, Francis made a declaration that now appears prophetic: “I want a mess.”

Title: The Board Game Industry Is Burning – and It's Their Own Fault
Description: “Are board game tariffs really 245%? Or is the industry being played? This deep-dive exposes the truth behind the panic, with real HTS codes, broken math, and a ruthless takedown of Gloomhaven publisher Cephalofair.

Title: Keeping Kids Interested in Science Is a Matter of Language
Description:
As children get older, their understanding of science and being a scientist changes.
The words adults use are a critical part of keeping them engaged in discovery

Title: Measles, Whooping Cough, the Laschamp Event and a Colossal Squid
Description: This week’s news roundup covers measles and whooping cough cases, evidence of a carbon cycle on Mars and the first glimpse at a colossal squid in its natural habitat.

Title: Why GLP-1 Weight-Loss Drugs Are Hard to Make into Pills
Description:
Some experts say oral versions of popular weight-loss drugs such as Wegovy could offer people more flexibility and accessibility.
What’s keeping the pills from taking off?

Title: 21 Things You Might Not Know About ‘The Last of Us’
Description:
HBO Max’s hit adaptation of the video game is back for its second season.
Here‘s what you need to know, from who could have played Ellie and Joel to how the show brought the infected to life to what to expect in season 2.
Warning: Spoilers ahead!

Title: LLMs That Code: Why Marketers Should Care (Even If You’ve Never Touched An IDE) via @sejournal, @siliconvallaeys
Description:
Thanks to LLMs, marketers can now turn tasks into code, automating reports, ad scripts, and workflows with zero programming skills.
The post LLMs That Code: Why Marketers Should Care (Even If You’ve Never Touched An IDE) appeared first on Search Engine Journa…

Title: This compact flagship is getting bypass charging to go with its giant battery
Description: Bypass charging is one of the niftier charging features, and it turns out a compact flagship launching this week will have this option.

Title: Need Earth Day optimism? Here are some environmental do-gooders in your backyard
Description: At a time when communities feel fractured, here's a look at online communities taking a pragmatic approach to changing the world for the better.

Title: SpaceX launches its 32nd Dragon cargo mission to the ISS for NASA
Description: SpaceX launched its 32nd cargo mission to the International Space Station today (April 21), sending more than 3 tons of supplies and scientific hardware to the orbiting lab for NASA.
